author: craigmcc
msg: Restore the ability of Tomcat 4.0 to render its default HTTP error
messages with a content type of "text/html", even though sendError() is no
longer allowed to do this (per clarifications to appear in the next 2.3
draft spec).  This bit of code probably needs some refactoring during a

author: craigmcc
msg: Single Sign On support now remembers the authentication method used to
originally authenticate the cached user Principal.

author: craigmcc
msg: When expiring a session, mark it invalid at the beginning of the process,
so that any simultaneous access to this session from a different thread

author: craigmcc
msg: When mapping requests to a particular host, the name comparison would fail
if the default host was not configured in lower case.  The name comparison
is now correctly case insensitive in all circumstances.
